consoleAdapters.name: Aladdin Deck Enhancer
consoleAdapters.details: The Aladdin Deck Enhancer is a system-enhancing adaptor to use Compact Cartridges on the Nintendo Entertainment System released in November 1992, with its planned library to reach a total 24 games by the end of 1993. However, only seven games were actually released.

consoleAdapters.name: HES Unidapter
consoleAdapters.details: The HES Unidaptor is a video game adapter which allows any Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) console game to be operated on any NES hardware despite the 10NES region security chip.

consoleAdapters.name: Magic Key
consoleAdapters.details: Game cartridge converter which lets Europeans play North American NES games.
